workExperience.title: Front-End Web Developer
workExperience.company: Milano Nails Spa / Nails of America
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a visually appealing and user-friendly site enabling online bookings boosting overall appointments by around 130 customers per week.

Optimized the website for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across all platforms and increasing mobile traffic and in addition to social media increased appointments and overall community interest.

workExperience.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Spearheaded the redesign of a non-profit organization site, resulting in a 70% increase in user visits and a 50% increase in proceeds.
Implemented cost-effective web solutions reducing operational expenses by nearly 90%.
Conducted tutorial sessions to train non-profit staff in website management, enabling them to update content independently.
